title: Login page crashes on submit
stepsToReproduce:
1. Open app
2. Navigate to login
3. Enter credentials
4. Tap submit
expectedResult: User should be logged in successfully

title: Search results show incorrect data
stepsToReproduce:
1. Open app
2. Use search feature
3. Enter 'test'
4. View results

title: Button alignment issue on small screens
stepsToReproduce:
1. Open app on device with small screen
2. Navigate to home screen
3. Observe button placement
